title: Trespass on Summerland
creator_credit: Brighton Grammar School (Vic.). Film Makers Club
brief_description: A few boys enjoying a camping holiday are evicted from their camp by an irate farmer. They later save his son trapped on a precipitous cliff face. (Awards: 2nd prize at the International Contest for Young Film Makers, Milan, Italy)
